name: Human Rescue Lander
description:
HUMAN RESCUE LANDER

Created for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 3!

Aliens have blasted humans into the sky and let them levitate there for their own amusement. Rescue them with your space ship before the time runs out. But be aware when landing, as a hard shock can damage your ship!

Good luck!

Use LEFT-ARROW, RIGHT-ARROW and UP-ARROW to play the game.

What level can you reach?

Tools used:

  • DragonRuby Game Toolkit
  • Sublime Text
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • Bfxr
  • Audacity
